response: the issue of protecting personal information is becoming more and more relevant in today's world, where everything is digitalized. with each passing day, technology becomes more advanced, and our private lives are exposed online. companies need to be transparent about how they handle our data and ensure that it remains confidential. the gdpr (general data protection regulation) has been established to regulate the usage of personal information in europe, but there is still a lot of work to do. we have to raise awareness on this topic, and companies must prioritize their users' privacy.<|endoftext|>
